DOC.brief_summary: The aim of the present study is to take stronger action in solving the problems of malnutrition in the hospital setting and in the first two months after patient's discharge. The main objective is to evaluate the clinical benefit (eg. QoL, body composition and body function) of nutritional intervention (nutritional therapy) in a sample of patients at nutritional risk according to the NRS 2002.
DOC.brief_title: Feeding the Patient at Nutritional Risk: Does the Clinical Outcome Improve?
